roomType.title: Semi Deluxe Room
roomType.info:
These 3BHK Service Apartments are ideal for travelers seeking a home away from home with all the modern amenities of a hotel.
Each apartment features a fully-equipped kitchen, allowing guests to prepare their own meals and snacks. Alternatively, we offer a common kitchen where you can order meals prepared by our chef, who provides hygienic and home-style dishes at a reasonable price. This saves you both the trouble and the cost of dining out.
Our 3BHK service apartments are perfect for families, business travelers, or anyone looking for a comfortable place to stay. Conveniently located in the Malad area of Mumbai Suburban, the apartments offer easy access to all Malad stations.

apart.title: Kalpaturu Hometel
apart.info:
Welcome to our Hometel, the perfect blend of home comfort and hotel luxury for travelers seeking a warm and inviting place to stay.
Our hometel offers a cozy and fully-equipped kitchen where guests can prepare their own meals and snacks. If you prefer, you can also enjoy meals from our common kitchen, where our chef prepares hygienic and home-style dishes at a reasonable price. This option helps you save money and enjoy healthy, delicious food without the expense of dining out.
Located conveniently in the Malad area of Mumbai Suburban, our hometel provides easy access to all Malad stations. Nearby shopping centers and restaurants offer top-notch services, ensuring a pleasant and enjoyable stay. Our hometel is perfect for business travelers, families, or anyone seeking a comfortable and welcoming place to stay.
